remarks.para: May be inoperative provided one display is available to the Captain.

note.para: Captain’s EHSI display of weather radar or CDTI display of weather radar must be available to the Captain.
Refer to 34-58-1-2 for CDTI Weather Display
Verify that the Captain has display of weather radar available on the Captain’s EHSI or CDTI.

placard.para: Placard adjacent to affected indicator "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
